messages.title: Vote for a strong voice for Hackney Central
messages.content: Only your local Lib-Dem team will stand up for our area. We're local people just like you and we want what's best for Hackney Central. Labour councillors have served the interests of the Labour group, not local residents. We will answer only to you, our neighbours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib-Dems will make the first £10,000 you earn tax free, paid for by asking banks, more than the average family in Hackney, £700 a year better off.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The best policies for the environment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib-Dems have the best policies to safeguard the environment from local cycling and recycling schemes to national action.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair start for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will increase school funding by £2.5 billion every year. We will cut class sizes and spend more time in the classroom and raise standards in every school with smaller classes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer deals on rents and leaseholds
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will listen to tenants and leaseholders and charge a fairer deal for the quality of service improving, and no major works imposed upon leaseholders and costs without proper consultation.

We'll work to stop crime before it starts - more funding to target those most likely to offend, and give back to the city of re-offending, such as Diamond Project, a charity-funded community grant project scheme that offers customised advice, support and funding, and re-offending.

mentions.candidate: Dave Raval, Julia Slay, Reuben Thompson, Adrian Gee Turner
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems or Labour can win around here. Last time, Labour and the Lib Dems came first and second in the Parliamentary and local ward elections.

issues.economy: Lib Dem Vince Cable, predicted recession correctly.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrats will increase school funding by £2.5 billion every year.
issues.environment: The Lib-Dems have the best policies to safeguard the environment.
